name: Metamorph (itch) (Denise Meier, d4star, manolo.wi)
description:
METAMORPH is a clicker game where you do exactly four things:

eat - sleep - morph - build 

and repeat!

By digging out different kinds of food you can METAMORPH into many different characters. Choose wisely what you eat to be able to get all of those 625 characters we put in there! Gain tons of useless XP and achievements to hang up in your gallery!
